trans-unit.source: Provides basic functionality for controls that display a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce funzionalità di base per controlli che visualizzano un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>, o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton"> </xref> si fa clic sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: ToolStripDropDownItem is the abstract base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, which can host items directly or host additional items in a drop-down container.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripDropDownItem è la classe base astratta per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, che possono ospitare direttamente gli elementi o ospitare elementi aggiuntivi in un contenitore di riepilogo a discesa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You do this by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: Eseguire questa operazione impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>proprietà da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>e impostando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A>proprietà di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: Access these drop-down items directly through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Accedere a questi elementi di elenco a discesa direttamente tramiti il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: È necessario derivare un controllo elenco a discesa dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe per le funzionalità di riepilogo a discesa per avere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe con il testo specificato, l'immagine e azione da intraprendere quando si seleziona il controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: È necessario derivare un controllo elenco a discesa dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe per le funzionalità di riepilogo a discesa per avere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Il testo visualizzato del controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> da visualizzare nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: L'azione da intraprendere quando viene selezionato il controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe con il testo di visualizzazione specificato, immagine, e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> raccolta che contiene il controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: You must derive a drop-down control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> class in order to have any drop-down functionality for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> control.
trans-unit.target: È necessario derivare un controllo elenco a discesa dalla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>classe per le funzionalità di riepilogo a discesa per avere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Il testo visualizzato del controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> da visualizzare nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> collection that the drop-down control contains.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> raccolta che contiene il controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> class with the specified display text, image, action to take when the drop-down control is clicked, and control name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> classe con il testo specificato, l'immagine, l'azione da intraprendere quando si seleziona il controllo elenco a discesa e il nome del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The display text of the drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Il testo visualizzato del controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> da visualizzare nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: The action to take when the drop-down control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: L'azione da intraprendere quando viene selezionato il controllo elenco a discesa.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo oggetto accessibilità per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Crea un oggetto generico <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> per gli eventi che possono essere definiti.

trans-unit.source: The CreateDefaultDropDown method is automatically called if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property finds no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CreateDefaultDropDown viene chiamato automaticamente se la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>proprietà trova non <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>associata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto creato <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico `Dispose()`(metodo) e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro è true, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>riferimenti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that will be displayed when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> che sarà visualizzato quando si <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> creates a generic drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Se nessun <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>è associato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>, una chiamata a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A>Crea un controllo elenco a discesa generico.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.CreateDefaultDropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a drop-down control is automatically generated, which means that items are added to the collection, and you then set the DropDown property to an explicit drop-down control, you might lose data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se un controllo elenco a discesa viene generato automaticamente, il che significa che gli elementi vengono aggiunti alla raccolta e impostare quindi la proprietà di elenco a discesa per un controllo elenco a discesa esplicito, si potrebbero perdere dati.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> che è associato il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> chiude.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> emerges from its parent container.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica la direzione in cui il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> emerge dal contenitore padre.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è impostata su un valore che non fa parte di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownDirection"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la raccolta di elementi di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> che è associata a questo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the DropDownItems property to get all the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> that is referred to by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la proprietà DropDownItems per ottenere tutti gli elementi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> of controls.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref> dei controlli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the screen coordinates, in pixels, of the upper-left corner of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le coordinate dello schermo, in pixel, dell'angolo superiore sinistro del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""></xref> representing the x and y screen coordinates, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_Point" name="Point" href=""> </xref> che rappresenta gli assi x e y in pixel coordinate dello schermo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> has opened.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> è aperta.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when the user clicks the drop down item or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica quando l'utente fa clic nell'elenco a discesa di elementi o quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.ShowDropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to dynamically populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo evento per compilare in modo dinamico <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs as the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> is opening.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica come il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> viene aperto.

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è stato creato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has been created otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è stato creato in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> controlli associati.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> has <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes a visible <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> hidden.
trans-unit.target: Rende un visibili <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"> </xref> nascosto.

trans-unit.source: Use the HideDropDown method to prevent the user from choosing one of the options available on the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo HideDropDown per impedire all'utente di scegliere una delle opzioni disponibili nel associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Bounds*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownClosed"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownClosed method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDropDownClosed consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raised in response to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*> method.
trans-unit.target: Generato in risposta al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.HideDropDown*>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownHide method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDropDownHide consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItemClicked"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnDropDownItemClicked method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnDropDownItemClicked consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questa è la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemClickedEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.EventArgs>che contiene i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è nello stato premuto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is in the pressed state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è premuta stato; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto di comando.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato durante la pre-elaborazione di messaggi per gestire le chiavi di comando.

trans-unit.source: Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys.
trans-unit.target: Tasti di comando sono chiavi che hanno la precedenza sui tasti di input regolare.

trans-unit.source: Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: Tasti di scelta rapida e menu di scelta rapida sono esempi di tasti di comando.

trans-unit.source: The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo deve restituire `true` per indicare che è stato elaborato il tasto di comando o `false` per indicare che la chiave non è un tasto di comando.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> implementation of this method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> if there are items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>l'implementazione di questo metodo chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>se sono presenti voci nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDownItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ProcessCmdKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this implementation calls the base class implementation.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, questa implementazione chiama l'implementazione della classe base.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passato per riferimento, che rappresenta il messaggio della finestra da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valori che rappresenta il tasto da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>in tutti i casi.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog key.
trans-unit.target: Elabora un tasto della finestra di dialogo.

trans-unit.source: This method is called during message preprocessing to handle the UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT, ENTER, and SPACEBAR keys in order to navigate the hierarchy of drop-down menus.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato durante la pre-elaborazione di messaggi per gestire su, giù, sinistra, destra, invio e barra spaziatrice per navigare nella gerarchia del menu a discesa.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valori che rappresenta il tasto da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the item; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il tasto è stato elaborato dall'elemento; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> control associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Consente di visualizzare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> associato a questo controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowDropDown method to display the drop-down controls that have been set by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo ShowDropDown per visualizzare i controlli elenco a discesa che sono stati impostati per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem.DropDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"></xref> is the same as the parent <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem"> </xref> è uguale all'oggetto padre <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.
